title: Title
titleValidation: Title can only contain letters, numbers, spaces, and basic punctuation.
descriptionValidation: Description can only contain letters, numbers, spaces, and basic punctuation.
locationValidation: Location can only contain letters, numbers, spaces, and basic punctuation.
datePast: Date cannot be in the past.
imageValidation: Only JPEG, PNG, and GIF images are allowed.
imageSizeLimit: Image file size should be less than 5MB.
